wiki.powers: Cottonmouth possesses enhanced jaw and neck muscles and steel teeth enabling him to bite with sufficient force to crush cinderblock or deform metals softer than iron, to hang from rope by his teeth for up to an hour, and to open his mouth larger than the size of a human head.
wiki.abilities: Cottonmouth has above average hand-to-hand combat experience and his jaw muscles are Class 10 strength.
wiki.significant_issues: Joined the Serpent Society (Captain America #310); offered services to the Kingpin alongside Asp (Captain America #311); battled and killed MODOK (Captain America #313); battled Captain America alongside Rattler, Death Adder, and Diamondback, later freed from prison by Sidewinder (Captain America #315); voted against Diamondback in her trial (Captain America #380)
wiki.bio_text: Very little is known about the man known as Cottonmouth.  He was somehow contacted by [[Sidewinder (Seth Voelker)|Sidewinder]] and invited to join the criminal organization called the [[Serpent Society]].  Accepting the offer, Cottonmouth's first major success was slaying [[MODOK]] alongside teammate [[Death Adder]].  His next mission had him battling [[Captain America (Steve Rogers)|Captain America]] with Death Adder, [[Rattler]], and [[Diamondback (Rachel Leighton)|Diamondback]].  They were all defeated and imprisoned, but later freed by Sidewinder.
wiki.bio:
Very little is known about the man known as Cottonmouth. He was somehow contacted by [[Sidewinder (Seth Voelker)|Sidewinder]] and invited to join the criminal organization called the [[Serpent Society]]. Accepting the offer, Cottonmouth's first major success was slaying [[MODOK]] alongside teammate [[Death Adder]]. His next mission had him battling [[Captain America (Steve Rogers)|Captain America]] with Death Adder, [[Rattler]], and [[Diamondback (Rachel Leighton)|Diamondback]]. They were all defeated and imprisoned, but later freed by Sidewinder.
When the [[Viper (Madame Hydra)|Viper]] infiltrated the Serpent Society, Cottonmouth feigned siding with Sidewinder, but quickly betrayed their former leader. He went on to serve with the Serpent Society with [[King Cobra]] as leader. He also encountered [[Black Panther (T'Challa)|Black Panther]] and battled [[Luke Cage]]. His most recent activity has seen him allying himself with [[Hawkeye (Clint Barton)|Hawkeye]] to escape from prison.
